metadata.title: CVE-2019-20021 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A heap-based buffer over-read was discovered in canUnpack in p_mach.cpp in UPX 3.95 via a crafted Mach-O file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-20021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

upx-ucl - 3.96-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.96-2').
